AppDup2Pattern.name: Approximate Duplicate based on two Attributes
AppDup2Pattern.description: Check if there are records that have the same value in two important fields, suggesting that they describe the same real-world object.

AppDup3Pattern.name: Approximate Duplicate based on three Attributes
AppDup3Pattern.description: Check if there are records that have the same value in three important fields, suggesting that they describe the same real-world object.

CardImpliesMandAttPattern.name: Mandatory Attribute based on Cardinality Check
CardImpliesMandAttPattern.description: Check if an attribute exists that is mandatory on specific cardinalities of a field.

CardPattern.name: Cardinality Check
CardPattern.description: Check if the occurrence count of specific elements applies.

CardMatchPattern.name: Cardinality of Values Matching a Pattern
CardMatchPattern.description: Check if the occurrence count of elements matching a specific pattern applies.

ExistsIfExistsPattern.name: Existence Check for Conditioned Values
ExistsIfExistsPattern.description: Check if a record that contains a specific field also contains another required field.

CompSetIfMatchPattern.name: List Check for Values Matching a Pattern
CompSetIfMatchPattern.description: Check if specific field values are within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms when another field value matches a given pattern.

CardIfCompSetPattern.name: Cardinality Check for List-Conditioned Values
CardIfCompSetPattern.description: Check if the occurrence count of specific elements applies when a field value is within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms.

CardCompSetIfCompSetPattern.name: Cardinality Check for List-Conditioned Values in Another List
CardCompSetIfCompSetPattern.description: Check if the occurrence count of specific elements within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms applies when a field value is within another list of allowed (/forbidden) terms.

CheckFormatPattern.name: Check the Format of a Resource
CheckFormatPattern.description: Check if the resource referenced by a URL is of a given format.

CompDatabasePattern.name: Field Value in Database
CompDatabasePattern.description: Check if all values in a field are in a database.

CompPattern.name: Comparison Pattern
CompPattern.description: Check if the occurrence count of specific elements applies.

CompSetPattern.name: List Inclusion Check
CompSetPattern.description: Check if field values are within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms.

CompSetIsoPattern.name: List Inclusion Check (Isolated)
CompSetIsoPattern.description: Check if field values are within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms.

CompSetSinPattern.name: List Inclusion Check (Single)
CompSetSinPattern.description: Check if field values are within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms.

CompSetAnyPattern.name: List Inclusion Check (Any)
CompSetAnyPattern.description: Check if at least one field value is within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms.

CompValAnyPattern.name: Compare Values Within a Record
CompValAnyPattern.description: Check if any specific field value within a record comply with a value restriction.

CompValPattern.name: Compare Values
CompValPattern.description: Check if all values of a specific field within a record comply with a value restriction.

ContainsPattern.name: Contains Check
ContainsPattern.description: Check if specific field values contain a given substring (e.g. a URL prefix or part of an identifier).

ContainsIsoPattern.name: Contains Check (Isolated)
ContainsIsoPattern.description: Check if specific field values contain a given substring (e.g. a URL prefix or part of an identifier).

ContainsSinPattern.name: Contains Check (Single)
ContainsSinPattern.description: Check if specific field values contain a given substring (e.g. a URL prefix or part of an identifier).

ContainsListPattern.name: Contains List Check
ContainsListPattern.description: Check if specific field values contain any of a list of substrings (e.g., a URL prefix or part of an identifier).

ContainsListIsoPattern.name: Contains List Check (Isolated)
ContainsListIsoPattern.description: Check if specific field values contain any of a list of substrings (e.g., a URL prefix or part of an identifier).

ContainsListSinPattern.name: Contains List Check (Single)
ContainsListSinPattern.description: Check if specific field values contain any of a list of substrings (e.g., a URL prefix or part of an identifier).

DupValPattern.name: Duplicate Value Check
DupValPattern.description: Check if a specific element contains only unique field values.

FuncPattern.name: Functional Dependency Check
FuncPattern.description: Check if two elements containing the same value in one field also contain the same value in another field.

LocalUniquePattern.name: Local Uniqueness Check (File)
LocalUniquePattern.description: Check if specific field values are unique within a single file.

MandAttPattern.name: Mandatory Attribute
MandAttPattern.description: Check if a record contains a mandatory field (e.g. an attribute or an element with content).

MandElePattern.name: Mandatory Element
MandElePattern.description: Check if a record contains a mandatory element.

MandContPattern.name: Mandatory Content
MandContPattern.description: Check if an element contains the required content (e.g. another element, an attribute or text).

MandContIsoPattern.name: Mandatory Content (Isolated)
MandContIsoPattern.description: Check if an element contains mandatory content (e.g. another element, an attribute or text)

MandContSinPattern.name: Mandatory Content (Single)
MandContSinPattern.description: Check if an element contains mandatory content (e.g. another element, an attribute or text).

MandContAndPattern.name: Two Mandatory Contents
MandContAndPattern.description: Check if an element contains both mandatory contents (e.g. another element and an attribute).

MandContAndIsoPattern.name: Two Mandatory Contents (Isolated)
MandContAndIsoPattern.description: Check if an element contains both mandatory contents (e.g. another element and an attribute).

MandContAndSinPattern.name: Two Mandatory Contents (Single)
MandContAndSinPattern.description: Check if an element contains both mandatory contents (e.g. another element and an attribute).

Mand2EleOrPattern.name: Mandatory Content (One of Two Elements)
Mand2EleOrPattern.description: Check if an element contains at least one mandatory element from two alternatives.

Mand3EleOrPattern.name: Mandatory Content (One of Three Elements)
Mand3EleOrPattern.description: Check if an element contains at least one mandatory element from three alternatives.

MatchPattern.name: Regular Expression Check
MatchPattern.description: Check if specific field values match a particular pattern.

MatchIsoPattern.name: Regular Expression Check (Isolated)
MatchIsoPattern.description: Check if specific field values match a particular pattern.

MatchSinPattern.name: Regular Expression Check (Single)
MatchSinPattern.description: Check if specific field values match a particular pattern.

MatchListPattern.name: Regular Expression List Check
MatchListPattern.description: Check if specific field values match at least one pattern from a list of allowed (/forbidden) patterns.

MatchListIsoPattern.name: Regular Expression List Check (Isolated)
MatchListIsoPattern.description: Check if specific field values match at least one pattern from a list of allowed (/forbidden) patterns.

MatchListSinPattern.name: Regular Expression List Check (Single)
MatchListSinPattern.description: Check if specific field values match at least one pattern from a list of allowed (/forbidden) patterns.

StringLengthPattern.name: String Value Length Restriction
StringLengthPattern.description: Check if specific field values comply with the specified character length.

StringLengthIsoPattern.name: String Value Length Restriction (Isolated)
StringLengthIsoPattern.description: Check if specific field values comply with the specified character length.

StringLengthSinPattern.name: String Value Length Restriction (Single)
StringLengthSinPattern.description: Check if specific field values comply with the specified character length.

StringLengthRangePattern.name: String Value Length Restriction (Range)
StringLengthRangePattern.description: Check if specific field values fall within the specified character length range.

StringLengthRangeIsoPattern.name: String Value Length Restriction (Range, Isolated)
StringLengthRangeIsoPattern.description: Check if specific field values fall within the specified character length range.

StringLengthRangeSinPattern.name: String Value Length Restriction (Range, Single)
StringLengthRangeSinPattern.description: Check if specific field values fall within the specified character length range.

UniquePattern.name: Global Uniqueness Check (Across Records)
UniquePattern.description: Check if specific field values are unique across all records.

UniqueSinPattern.name: Global Uniqueness Check (Across Records) (Single)
UniqueSinPattern.description: Check if specific field values are unique across all records.

UniqueIsoPattern.name: Global Uniqueness Check (Across Records) (Isolated)
UniqueIsoPattern.description: Check if specific field values are unique across all records.

ValidLinkPattern.name: Valid Link
ValidLinkPattern.description: Check if a link value is a syntactically valid URL.

ValidLinkIsoPattern.name: Valid Link (Isolated)
ValidLinkIsoPattern.description: Check if a link value is a syntactically valid URL.

ValidLinkSinPattern.name: Valid Link (Single)
ValidLinkSinPattern.description: Check if a link value is a syntactically valid URL.

LinkSourcePattern.name: Link Source Check
LinkSourcePattern.description: Check if all link value targets a subpage within one of the specified domains (e.g. authority file domains).

LinkSourceExistsPattern.name: Link Source Existence Check
LinkSourceExistsPattern.description: Check if at least one link value targets a subpage within one of the specified domains (e.g. authority file domains).

LinkSourceIsoPattern.name: Link Source Check (Isolated)
LinkSourceIsoPattern.description: Check if a link value targets a subpage within one of the specified domains (e.g. authority file domains).

LinkSourceSinPattern.name: Link Source Check (Single)
LinkSourceSinPattern.description: Check if a link value targets a subpage within one of the specified domains (e.g. authority file domains).

LinkMimeTypePattern.name: Link MIME Type Check
LinkMimeTypePattern.description: Check if the MIME type of a link value is within a list of allowed MIME types.

LinkMimeTypeIsoPattern.name: Link MIME Type Check (Isolated)
LinkMimeTypeIsoPattern.description: Check if the MIME type of a link value is within a list of allowed MIME types.

LinkMimeTypeSinPattern.name: Link MIME Type Check (Single)
LinkMimeTypeSinPattern.description: Check if the MIME type of a link value is within a list of allowed MIME types.

LinkImageSizePattern.name: Link Image Size Check
LinkImageSizePattern.description: Check if a link value meets a minimum pixel dimension.

LinkImageSizeIsoPattern.name: Link Image Size Check (Isolated)
LinkImageSizeIsoPattern.description: Check if a link value meets a minimum pixel dimension.

LinkImageSizeSinPattern.name: Link Image Size Check (Single)
LinkImageSizeSinPattern.description: Check if a link value meets a minimum pixel dimension.
